thread.section_title: The Z Hotel Piccadilly - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great things come in small packages
thread.title_full: Great things come in small packages - Review of The Z Hotel Piccadilly, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: LouiseBCambridge
title: Great things come in small packages
text:
I was recommended by a business colleague and was very pleased to have stayed at this very central and good value hotel. Very warm welcome on arrival and easy check-in. Another guest checked in and was warmly "welcome back" as staff recognised he was a previous guest. They even offer cheese and wine as a complimentary welcome.
Room compact but very clean, facilities included water, range of drinks to make with a small kettle and a hairdryer. Some basic toiletries and good quality towels and bed linen. Most comfortable bed too.
